item.title: Why a Flat Management Structure Could Be Costing Your Business Top Talent
item.description: A study found women are less likely to apply to jobs at companies with very lean management, creating a ‘diversity deficit.’

item.title: Microsoft, OpenAI Reach a Non-Binding Deal to Allow OpenAI to Restructure
item.description: A deal could help OpenAI proceed to transform itself into a for-profit company and eventually go public.

item.title: Bill Gates’ Breakthrough Energy Just Picked These 20 Startups for Its Fellows Program
item.description: This cohort is tackling everything from fashion to cattle breeding. Here’s what the program is looking for and how to apply.

item.title: Apple Just Used This Presentation Trick to Make the iPhone 17 Message Stick
item.description: Apple executives use an advanced presentation tactic to create buzz for the iPhone 17.

item.title: This 1 Strategy Can Help You Retain Your Customers and Build Your Brand
item.description: The labor illusion is no brand delusion.
